mapper.select: select TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE_ID as cardTypeId, NAME as name, TB_CARD_TYPE.PAR_VALUE as parValue, SALE_PRICE as salePrice, CARD_TYPE as cardType, SMALL_PIC as smallPic from TB_CARD_TYPE where TB_CARD_TYPE.IS_ONLINE=1 and TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE=1 and SALE_PRICE is not null and PAR_VALUE is not null

select CARD_TYPE_ID as cardTypeId, NAME as name, PAR_VALUE as parValue, SALE_PRICE as salePrice, CARD_TYPE as cardType, SMALL_PIC as smallPic, BIG_PIC as bigPic, IS_ONLINE as isOnline, DESCRIBE as describe, MEMO as memo from TB_CARD_TYPE where IS_ONLINE=1 and CARD_TYPE=1 and CARD_TYPE_ID=#{cardTypeId}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_VOUCHER (VOUCHER_ID, VOUCHER_NO, VOUCHER_TYPE, CARD_TYPE_ID, PAR_VALUE, SALE_PRICE, IS_GIVE, RECHANGE_PASSWORD, STATE, BUY_MAN, MEMO, DELTE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{voucherId}, #{voucherNo}, #{voucherType}, #{cardTypeId}, #{parValue}, #{salePrice}, #{isGive}, #{rechangePassword}, #{state}, #{buyMan}, #{memo}, #{delteFlag}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.delete: delete from TB_VOUCHER where VOUCHER_ID=#{value} and VOUCHER_TYPE='5' and STATE='正在购买'
mapper.select: select TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE_ID as cardTypeId, NAME as name, TB_CARD_TYPE.PAR_VALUE as parValue, TB_CARD_TYPE.SALE_PRICE as salePrice, CARD_TYPE as cardType, SMALL_PIC as smallPic, TB_CARD_NUMBER.card_number as cardNumber from TB_CARD_TYPE left join (select CARD_TYPE_ID, BEGIN_MONEY as SALE_PRICE, COUNT(GROUP_CARD_ID) as card_number from TB_GROUP_CARD where CARD_STATE='激活' and IS_ONLINE_SALE=1 and CARD_TYPE_ID is not null group by CARD_TYPE_ID, BEGIN_MONEY) as TB_CARD_NUMBER on TB_CARD_NUMBER.CARD_TYPE_ID=TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE_ID and TB_CARD_TYPE.PAR_VALUE=TB_CARD_NUMBER.SALE_PRICE where TB_CARD_TYPE.IS_ONLINE=1 and TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE=2

select TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE_ID as cardTypeId, NAME as name, PAR_VALUE as parValue, TB_CARD_TYPE.SALE_PRICE as salePrice, TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE as cardType, SMALL_PIC as smallPic, BIG_PIC as bigPic, IS_ONLINE as isOnline, DESCRIBE as describe, MEMO as memo, TB_CARD_NUMBER.card_number as cardNumber from TB_CARD_TYPE, (select COUNT(GROUP_CARD_ID) as card_number from TB_GROUP_CARD where CARD_STATE='激活' and TB_GROUP_CARD.CARD_TYPE_ID=#{cardTypeId} and IS_ONLINE_SALE=1 and exists (select 1 from TB_CARD_TYPE where TB_CARD_TYPE.PAR_VALUE=TB_GROUP_CARD.BEGIN_MONEY and TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE_ID=#{cardTypeId})) as TB_CARD_NUMBER where TB_CARD_TYPE.IS_ONLINE=1 and TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE_ID=#{cardTypeId}

select top 1 GROUP_CARD_ID, GROUP_CARD_NO, BEGIN_MONEY, NOW_MONEY, CARD_STATE, CARD_TYPE_ID, BUY_MAN, MEMO, RECHARGE_CUSTOMER_ID from TB_GROUP_CARD where CARD_STATE='激活' and CARD_TYPE_ID=#{cardTypeId} and IS_ONLINE_SALE=1 and exists (select 1 from TB_CARD_TYPE where TB_GROUP_CARD.BEGIN_MONEY=TB_CARD_TYPE.PAR_VALUE and TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE_ID=#{cardTypeId}) order by GROUP_CARD_NO
mapper.delete: delete from TB_PAY_TRADE where OUT_TRADE_NO=#{value} and (PAY_STATUS=1 or PAY_STATUS=3)
